entries.description: SAM debugging: "Invalid (or missing) template file" may occur even when a valid template.yaml is specified by `invokeTarget.templatePath` in the launch config. #2614
Redshift: The output message is not clear when a sql query is successful but returns no record.
Redshift: Re-launched connection wizard shows the old (stale) connection.
`AWS: Add SAM Debug Configuration` command only works the first time it is invoked.
Improved performance of CloudFormation file watcher startup
Output panel always opens at VS Code launch.
Detect and notify about invalid settings.json #3910
Redshift: "Create Notebook" opens an untitled document instead of prompting to "Save As"
CloudWatch Logs: Preserve quickpick menu position when loading more items.
CodeWhisperer: reduce auto-suggestions when there is immediate right context
